Ultimate Behavior Questions

Mar 7, 2021

  • Topics
  • Links

Topics

  • Innovation
    • Whats the most innovative idea you implemented? Why its innovative?
    • Proudest professional accomplishment
    • Describe a situation in which you found a creative way to overcome an obstacle or when you did not have time to solve all the problems which PM brought? Tell me about a time when you came up with a new approach to a problems
  • Conflicts
    • Tell me about the last time a customer or coworker got upset with you
  • Complex tech challenges
  • Pressure
    • A project you are through more than 75% and had to pivot
    • Tell me about the toughest decision you’ve had to make in the past six months
  • Failure
    • Tell me about a time when you failed and how you handled failure/learnt
    • Mistake - Tell me about a time you wish you’d handled a situation differently with a colleague? What’s your greatest professional regret?
  • Saying no and persuading
    • How do you pushback or challenge a decision from top/peer?
  • Mentoring
    • Example of a peer or junior struggling and helped
  • Ownership and Multiple responsibilities
    • Tell me a time when you went above and beyond, outside your responsibility

Why Looking for a change? Why this company?

Links

  • Netflix LP
  • Facebook LP
